seo.title: Find Your Ideal Virtual Partner
seo.subtitle: Let your AI character take care of your desires, no matter how intimate
seo.aiDesc: With our AI technology and adaptive learning system, you can experience an authentic and passionate relationship with the partner of your dreams.
seo.freedomDesc: The choice is yours: live a unique romantic adventure with a devoted partner, or multiply exciting encounters with different characters.
seo.customDesc: Choose from a variety of personalities, styles and charms. Each character has their own story, desires and unique way of communicating.
seo.progressDesc: Your character learns to know you through your exchanges. Set the pace and increase the intensity, from light flirting to the most intimate conversations.
seo.progressCta: As you progress, unlock exclusive content and special moments. Every interaction counts and brings you closer to new experiences.
seo.waitingForYou: Your virtual companion is waiting for you

editor.title: 1. Site Publisher
editor.company: Company name: Sugarush by Thomas Damien
editor.address: Address: Rue des Pléiades, Melesse 35520, France

intellectual.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on this site (texts, images, videos, logos, design) is the exclusive property of Sugarush or its partners. Any reproduction, distribution, or use without prior authorization is strictly prohibited.

data.title: 4. Personal Data
data.content: To learn more about how we collect and process your personal data, see our

liability.title: 5. Liability
liability.content: Sugarush makes every effort to ensure the accuracy and updating of information on this site. However, Sugarush cannot guarantee the accuracy, precision, or completeness of the information provided on this site.

intro.title: Preamble
intro.content: These Terms of Service govern the use of Sugarush.me and its services. By accessing the site, you accept these Terms without reservation.

object.title: 1. Purpose
object.content: Sugarush is a platform offering conversations with AI characters and interactive immersive scenarios. The site allows users to chat with artificial intelligences in a playful and private setting.

access.title: 2. Access to Service
access.content: Access to the site is reserved for adults (18 years and older). By signing up, you certify that you meet the required legal age. Sugarush reserves the right to suspend or delete access for any user who does not comply with this condition.

account.title: 3. User Account
account.content: To access certain services, you must create an account with a valid email address. You are responsible for the confidentiality of your credentials and all activities performed from your account. In case of fraudulent use, you must immediately inform Sugarush.

content.title: 4. Content and Use
content.content: Content generated by AI is provided for entertainment purposes only. Sugarush does not guarantee the accuracy or relevance of generated responses. It is forbidden to use the service for illegal purposes, harassment, or to share content contrary to public morals.

liability.title: 5. Liability
liability.content: Sugarush cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the service, including interruptions, bugs, or inappropriate content generated by AI. Users use the service at their own risk.

intellectual.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All elements of the site (design, texts, images, logos) are protected by copyright. Any reproduction or use without authorization is prohibited.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: Sugarush reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account in case of violation of these Terms, without notice or compensation.

law.title: 8. Applicable Law
law.content: These Terms are governed by French law. Any dispute will be submitted to the competent courts of France.

preamble.title: Preamble
preamble.content: These Terms of Sale govern all transactions made on Sugarush.me. By making a purchase, you accept these Terms without reservation.

prices.title: 1. Prices
prices.content: Prices are displayed in euros (€) and include all taxes. Sugarush reserves the right to change its prices at any time, but current subscriptions remain at the subscribed price until their expiration.

order.title: 2. Order
order.content: Any order placed on the site constitutes a firm purchase commitment. You will receive a confirmation email after payment validation.

payment.title: 3. Payment
payment.content: Payments are secured via Stripe. Accepted payment methods include: credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), Apple Pay, Google Pay. Payment is due immediately upon order.

delivery.title: 4. Delivery
delivery.content: Digital services (credits, subscriptions) are activated instantly after payment validation. No physical delivery is required.

withdrawal.title: 5. Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.content: In accordance with Article L221-28 of the Consumer Code, the right of withdrawal does not apply to digital content provided immediately with your express agreement.

warranty.title: 6. Warranties
warranty.content: Sugarush is committed to providing quality service. In case of major malfunction preventing the use of the service, you can request a partial or full refund depending on the severity of the problem.

claims.title: 7. Claims
claims.content: For any claim regarding an order, contact us at: aloha@sugarush.me. We are committed to responding within 7 business days.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Sugarush, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and what your rights are.

collected.title: 1. Data Collected
collected.item2: Connection data: IP address, connection logs
collected.item3: Usage data: conversation history, visited scenarios
collected.item4: Payment data: processed by Stripe (we never store your banking details)

usage.title: 2. Data Usage
usage.content: Your data is used to: manage your account and subscriptions, improve our services and personalize your experience, ensure site security and prevent fraud, comply with our legal obligations.

legal.title: 3. Legal Basis
legal.content: The processing of your data is based on: contract execution (service provision), your consent (cookies, newsletter), our legitimate interest (service improvement, security).

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We never sell your data. It may only be shared with: our technical providers (hosting, payment), legal authorities in case of judicial requisition.

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.content: Your data is retained as long as your account is active. After deleting your account, your data is anonymized or deleted within 30 days, unless there is a legal obligation to retain it.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.item1: Right of access: view your data
rights.item2: Right of rectification: correct your data
rights.item3: Right to erasure: delete your data
rights.item4: Right to portability: retrieve your data
rights.item5: Right to object: refuse certain processing
rights.contact: To exercise your rights, contact us at: aloha@sugarush.me

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for site operation (authentication, cart) and analytical cookies to improve user experience. You can manage your preferences in your browser settings.

security.title: 8. Security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data: encrypted connections (HTTPS), secure authentication, regular backups, restricted data access.

changes.title: 9. Changes
changes.content: This policy may be updated. Any substantial change will be notified to you by email or via a notification on the site.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: For any question regarding this policy, contact us at: aloha@sugarush.me

support.title: Help Center
support.subtitle: Find answers to your questions or contact our team

q1.question: How do I create an account?
q1.answer: Click 'Sign up' in the top right, enter your email address and create a password. You will receive a confirmation email to activate your account.

q2.question: What payment methods are accepted?
q2.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), Apple Pay and Google Pay. All payments are secured via Stripe.

q3.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
q3.answer: Go to Settings > Subscription > Unsubscribe. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current period. You will not be charged for the next period.

q4.question: Can I get a refund?
q4.answer: Yes, you have 24 hours after your payment to request a refund. After this period or if you have used more than 20 messages, no refund will be provided.

q5.question: Are conversations private?
q5.answer: Yes, all your conversations are encrypted and strictly confidential. We never share them with third parties. See our Privacy Policy for more details.

q6.question: How does the AI work?
q6.answer: Our AI characters use advanced language models to generate natural and contextual responses. Conversations are generated in real-time based on your messages.

q7.question: Can I create my own character?
q7.answer: Yes, you can create custom characters by choosing their appearance, personality and character traits. This feature is available for premium subscribers.

q8.question: Is the site available on mobile?
q8.answer: Yes, Sugarush is fully responsive and works perfectly on mobile, tablet and desktop. You can access your account from any device.

support.contactSubtitle: Our team is here to help you
support.hoursContent: Our team is available Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm (Paris time). Requests received outside these hours will be processed the next business day.
support.include1: A detailed description of your problem
support.include4: The browser and device you're using

ageVerification.title: Age Verification
ageVerification.message: You must be 18 years or older to access this site. This site contains adult content.
ageVerification.warning: By continuing, you confirm that you are of legal age in your country
ageVerification.legal: By using this site, you accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
